name: Ensure Vanilla Multi Pack 400 g
description:
Ensure Original Vanilla Nutrition Powder - Complete, balanced nutrition for everyday health. Each serving of Ensure Original Nutrition Powder provides complete, balanced nutrition. Every prepared 8 fl.oz serving has: 9 grams of high-quality protein, 25 essential vitamins and minerals and includes antioxidants. 250 nutritious calories of delicious vanilla flavour. Gluten-free. Suitable for lactose intolerance. Halal.


 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
